New Records: Parker Meadows hit a grand slam, the second-fastest pitch a Tigers player has homered off of in the pitch-tracking era (2008)
Key Match Events: Detroit Tigers scored four runs in the bottom of the ninth inning for a dramatic comeback win against the San Diego Padres
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Tigers are 71-70 on the season and 5.0 games back of the third and final wild card spot in the American League
